shortDescription.default: Quick access to all SharePoint sites with search, favorites, and navigation

longDescription.default: Helvety SPO Explorer provides a convenient navigation panel for SharePoint Online. Features include quick site access, favorites management, site search, and customizable settings. Appears as a floating button in the top navigation bar.
